function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Focus on current state rather than future states","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Calculation of gap levels for pandemic-sustainable indicators","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on previous research and literature review may result in outdated or incomplete information about pandemic indicators and risk mitigation strategies.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on internationally recognized sustainability systems may not fully address pandemic-specific indicators and risk mitigation strategies.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Different building codes and systems of sustainability assessments in different countries may lead to inconsistencies and lack of standardization in pandemic-sustainable criteria for residential buildings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of a complete system to measure building readiness responding to pandemics may result in incomplete or ineffective preparedness for future pandemics.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalance in pandemic response indicators among different gbc&rss may result in limited options for residential buildings to address specific pandemic-related challenges.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of disease transmission in built environments due to lack of sustainable practices and certifications","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of residential buildings as multifunctional spaces during pandemics and post-pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise in importance of residential sustainability due to predicted increase in zoonotic diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate shading and ventilation in urban green spaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in urban policy and planning to address new behaviors and needs arising from the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases spread through outdoor activities and social interactions in urban parks during the pandemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for urban green spaces may lead to overcrowding and insufficient social distancing measures in parks.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ugs serving as centers of public gathering can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased importance of green spaces and ugs as places of refuge during the pandemic may lead to overcrowding and congestion in these areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on ugs for respite and isolation can lead to non-compliance with public health guidelines and riskier behavior in these areas.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dichotomy in access to green spaces resulting in localized or long-distance travel","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in use of private cars and increase in pedestrian traffic for reaching green spaces","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced accessibility to ugs due to pandemic restrictions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission risks in densely built urban areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on mental health and well-being due to reduced access to ugs","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Meta-analysis based on ’high’ and ’low’ greenspace exposure defined by individual papers’ highest and lowest categories, which may result in inconsistent categorization and interpretation of exposure levels.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear definition of terms such as ’neighbourhood environment’ and ’built environment’ may lead to inconsistent inclusion or exclusion of studies related to contagious diseases.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The pandemic-related ’health and safety’ rating system does not directly address contagious diseases in residential buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased household water consumption due to more frequent hand washing, laundry, and cleaning/disinfection practices during the pandemic.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of disease transmission leading to extermination of local populations of species","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in monitoring data due to closures and social distancing restrictions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced funding and income for conservation activities and local communities","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biodiversity conservation deprioritized post-pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for holistic approaches to address zoonotic transmission and biodiversity loss","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Withdrawal of conservation funding due to conflict or social-political shifts","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Chronic underfunding of conservation programs and protected areas","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced capacity and increased costs of implementing safety procedures may lead to inadequate conservation activities.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less urgent tasks such as research projects and long-term monitoring are deprioritized during the pandemic, leading to gaps in data and understanding of conservation needs.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilization of militarized conservation methods post-pandemic may have severe societal and psychological repercussions, particularly for communities previously traumatized by war.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of income from tourism impacting biodiversity and increasing reliance on natural resources","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Danger and difficulty of accessing areas in warfare and disaster zones","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased hunting pressure and shifts in trading patterns leading to enhanced trading of endangered species","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease transmission between wildlife and domestic animals impacting local incomes and livelihoods","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sudden and sustained decline in tourist numbers impacting local revenue and livelihoods","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of zoonotic diseases from wildlife to domestic animals or human communities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on livelihoods and food security leading to increased exploitation of wildlife and habitats","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission between wild and domestic animal or human populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pollutants spread by aquatic and airborne pathways","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Military infrastructure, defoliation, wildlife exploitation, and trade in conflict areas","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of funds for conservation areas due to temporary cessation of international tourism","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on community engagement events and fundraising for conservation projects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of non-covid-19 perturbations on conservation outcomes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex conservation outcomes of non-covid-19 perturbations","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
